author: pderop
msg: The setDebug() method is now returning this component. Implemented the ensureNotActive() method.
The unregisterService() method is now catching an IllegalStateException, because potentially, when unregistering a service,
it is sometimes possible that the component bundle is not active anymore: this can happen when the bundle is stopped, and at this
point, the component removal (that is: dm.remove(Component c)) is scheduled in the component executor, but the scheduled task is
then executed by another thread ... So, we have to catch the potential IllegalStateException.
We also do an optimisation: when doing benchmark, if the bundle is stopped and if the component removal (dm.remove(component) is
